section.title: 增加司机
section.sql: insert into Driver_Information( DriverID , DriverName , DriverAccount , CarTelephone , LicenseID ) values( @DriverID , @DriverName , @DriverAccount , @CarTelephone , @LicenseID )

section.title: 修改司机
section.sql: update Driver_Information set DriverID=@DriverID , DriverName=@DriverName , DriverAccount=@DriverAccount , CarTelephone=@CarTelephone , LicenseID=@LicenseID where DriverID=@DriverID

section.title: 未分配车辆司机
section.sql: select DriverName,DriverAccount from Driver_Information where LicenseID=''

section.title: 更新车牌
section.sql: update Driver_Information set LicenseID=@LicenseID where DriverID =@DriverID
